pullRequest.title: [DOCS] Label legacy rollup APIs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes:

Updates several rollup API titles to include "legacy"
Adds a deprecation warning for legacy APIs

Previews

Rollup APIs: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-apis.html#legacy-rollup-apis
Create legacy rollup jobs API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-put-job.html
Delete legacy rollup jobs API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-delete-job.html
Start legacy rollup jobs API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-start-job.html
Stop legacy rollup jobs API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-stop-job.html
Get legacy rollup jobs API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-get-job.html
Get legacy rollup caps API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-get-rollup-caps.html
Get legacy rollup index caps API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-get-rollup-index-caps.html
Legacy rollup search API: https://elasticsearch_65518.docs-preview.app.elstc.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/rollup-search.html

nodes.bodyText:
I plan to add an xref to the updated overview page once that's ready. I've added a note to #65515.
I don't think that's a blocker for this PR tho.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,25 @@
+ifdef::permanently-unreleased-branch[]
+
+[role="xpack"]
+[testenv="basic"]
+[[rollup-put-job]]
+=== Create legacy {rollup-jobs} API
+[subs="attributes"]
+++++
+<titleabbrev>Create legacy {rollup-jobs}</titleabbrev>
+++++
+
+// tag::legacy-rollup-admon[]
+WARNING: This documentation is about legacy rollups. Legacy rollups are
+deprecated and will be replaced by new rollup functionality introduced in {es}

nodes.bodyText: I'm a little confused. is the above header also in a second ifndef::permanently-unreleased-branch?
